name: Capra
description:
In a distant land, all is Capra. 

A small prototype game made for the Summer Slow Jam 2022. The themes were "character creator" and "unexpected consequences".  This was our first attempt at developing a game under the constraints of a Jam.  Made with Godot.

3D Artist & Producer- Jennifer Anichowski - Portfolio

Programmer & Producer - Loteque - Code
